languages.text:
This unit gains -30 WS and BS.
At the beginning of their turn they must succeed at Reflexes (-10) to remove this effect.

traits.locale_text:
This unit gains -30 WS and BS.
At the beginning of their turn they must succeed at Reflexes (-10) to remove this effect.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} уменьшены на 30. Чтобы снять этот эффект, в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} этому существу нужно пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −10.

traits.locale_text: Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's turn, it must pass an Agility resistance test with a −10 penalty.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} nitelikleri 30'ar puan azalır. Yaratık, bu etkiyi ortadan kaldırmak için {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başında −10 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty.

traits.locale_text: Silah Yeteneği ve Balistik Yetenek nitelikleri 30'ar puan azalır. Yaratık, bu etkiyi ortadan kaldırmak için turunun başında −10 ceza puanına sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} nitelikleri 30'ar puan azalır. Yaratık, bu etkiyi ortadan kaldırmak için {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başında −10 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} se reducen en −30. Para eliminar este efecto, al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} esta criatura debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −10.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty.

traits.locale_text: La Habilidad de armas y la Habilidad de proyectiles se reducen en −30. Para eliminar este efecto, al comienzo de su turno esta criatura debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −10.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低30点。受影响的目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中受到-10减值，只有通过检定才能移除此效果。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty.

traits.locale_text: 武器技能与弹道技能降低30点。受影响的目标回合开始时，需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中受到-10减值，只有通过检定才能移除此效果。

languages.text: Réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} de −30. Pour supprimer cet effet, la créature doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −10 au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty.

traits.locale_text: Réduit la Capacité de combat et la Capacité de tir de −30. Pour supprimer cet effet, la créature doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −10 au début de son tour.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が-30される。この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、この効果を取り除くために、-10のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty.

traits.locale_text: 武器スキルと弾道スキルが-30される。この生物のターン開始時、この効果を取り除くために、-10のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならない。
武器スキルと弾道スキルが-30される。この生物のターン開始時、この効果を取り除くために、-10のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならない。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffen-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} sind um -30 reduziert. Um diesen Effekt zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} dieser Kreatur zu entfernen, ist eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von -10 erforderlich.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty.

traits.locale_text: Waffen- und Ballistik-Fähigkeit sind um -30 reduziert. Um diesen Effekt zu Beginn des Zuges dieser Kreatur zu entfernen, ist eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Abzug von -10 erforderlich.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} уменьшены на 30. Чтобы снять этот эффект, в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} этому существу нужно пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −10.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are reduced by −30. To remove this effect, at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty.

traits.locale_text: Ближний Бой и Дальний Бой уменьшены на 30. Чтобы снять этот эффект, в начале своего хода этому существу нужно пройти проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −10.
Ближний Бой и Дальний Бой уменьшены на 30. Чтобы снять этот эффект, в начале своего хода этому существу нужно пройти проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −10.
